\hypertarget{classrev_1_1_shader_program}{}\section{rev\+::Shader\+Program Class Reference}
\label{classrev_1_1_shader_program}\index{rev::ShaderProgram@{rev::ShaderProgram}}


\mbox{\hyperlink{struct_class}{Class}} representing an open\+GL shader program @detailed Note that QT\textquotesingle{}s abstraction of the shader program is bizarre... \char`\"{}\+I can\textquotesingle{}t tell what\textquotesingle{}s worse\+: 
that they made set\+Attribute\+Buffer a member of a type that has absolutely nothing to do with vertex state\char`\"{}.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$G\+Shader\+Program.\+h$>$}

\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
\mbox{\hyperlink{struct_class}{Class}} representing an open\+GL shader program @detailed Note that QT\textquotesingle{}s abstraction of the shader program is bizarre... \char`\"{}\+I can\textquotesingle{}t tell what\textquotesingle{}s worse\+: 
that they made set\+Attribute\+Buffer a member of a type that has absolutely nothing to do with vertex state\char`\"{}.

Get the the given uniform. 

starts the program @detailed upon binding, any uniforms in the queue will be updated \mbox{\Hypertarget{classrev_1_1_shader_program_a4c0b3cf05a3c12e8314fe4c6c11fd0b9}\label{classrev_1_1_shader_program_a4c0b3cf05a3c12e8314fe4c6c11fd0b9}}

Generate the name of the shader program given it\textquotesingle{}s subshaders \mbox{\Hypertarget{classrev_1_1_shader_program_aa7b7f1acfd59f0fdb168c2643d8654c2}\label{classrev_1_1_shader_program_aa7b7f1acfd59f0fdb168c2643d8654c2}}
